title: The Foundation - 12 Days of Claudemas
style: Electronic Pop, upbeat and inspiring, 120 BPM, modern production with synths
lyrics:
[Intro]
Twelve days to build a dream

[Verse 1]
On day one built the harness, FliGen came alive
React and Vite together, Express on the line
Day two added brains, Claude SDK arrived
Agent conversations, intelligence defined

[Verse 2]
Day three, second brain, Kybernesis in flight
Memory and context, keeping knowledge tight
Day four, images flowing, FAL and KIE unite
Pixels come to play, creating day and night

[Chorus]
Foundation's set, the journey's begun
Four days down, we're having fun
Building tools with Claude by my side
Twelve days of Claudemas, what a ride!

[Outro]
Four days done, eight more to go
prompt: An upbeat electronic pop track with modern synths and inspiring melodies, building excitement and momentum
description: Electronic Pop anthem covering the foundational tools built in the first four days of Claudemas. Upbeat and inspiring, celebrating the technical infrastructure.
